Tulsa World – Train, Train, and Train Some More

Read Full Article Here

Business Viewpoint: Interviews Can Make All the Difference

Read Full Article HERE
 

Tulsa World – Five Criteria Can Help Hire ‘A-Players’

 

Award Winning and Founder of Bridge Careers, Cory Minter, featured on Fox 23. Cory talks about how to make Google work for you when you are on the job hunt.

Bridge Careers Specialist was one of the 2013 Tulsa’s Fast 40 Honorees!

Founder and Owner Cory Minter Radio Interview on K95 Public Affairs 

Founder and Owner Cory Minter talks about How to Get Hired on Fox 23 News.

Trinitiy Employment featured in the Tulsa World Newspaper.

(Click to read the Tulsa World article written about a job fair hosted by Bridge Careers Travel Agencies)
